}

+ displayLoginPage()

+ validateBookId()

+ validateBookAvailability()
+ issueBook()
+ updateDatabaseInformation()
+ returnBook()
+ acceptBookAndMemberId()
+ viewMembers()
+ addOrRemoveBooks()
+ addBook()
+ enterBookDetails()
+ removeBook()
+ validateInformationProvided()
+ addOrRemoveMember()

+ enterMemberDetails()
+ selectToRemoveMember()
+ requireValidRemovalReason()
+ validateInformationCorrectness()
}
class User {
+ clickLoginButton()
+ clickConfirmButton()
+ clickViewUserDetails()
+ clickOnCategory()
+ searchBook()
+ borrowBooks()
+ returnsBook()
}
class Member {
+ logIn()
+ viewUserDetails()
+ searchBooks()
+ haveBorrowedBooks()

}
class Librarian {

}
class Guest {
+ searchBooks()
+ viewMembers()
}
class Administrator {
+ addOrRemoveMember()
+ validateInformationProvided()
}

@enduml

class System {
+ displayLoginPage()

+ validateEnteredInformation()

+ closePage()

+ retrieveFromDatabase()

+ selectDesiredBooks()
+ displaySelectedBooksDetails()
+ askUserToPrintDetails()
+ reserveBookForMember()
+ haveCorrectBookId()
+ selectBookToReserve()
+ acceptBookIdToReserve()
+ validateBookId()
+ askUserToSelectAnotherBook()
+ beLoggedIntoSystem()
+ searchBooks()
+ selectCategoryForSearchingBook()
+ validateBookAvailability()
+ issueBook()
+ updateInformationInDatabase()
+ haveBorrowedBooks()
+ returnBook()
+ acceptBookIdAndMemberId()
+ promptUserForSuccessfulReturnMessage()
+ viewMembers()
+ removeBook()
+ addOrRemoveBooksInDatabase()
+ addBook()
+ enterNewBookDetails()
+ removeBookIfOutdated()
+ validateProvidedInformation()
}
class User {
+ clickLoginButton()
+ clickConfirmButton()
+ clickViewUserDetails()
+ clickOnCategoryToBrowse()
+ clickSelectBookToView()
+ clickPrintDetails()
+ clickIgnoreStep()
+ searchBooks()
+ viewMembers()

}
class Member {
+ beLoggedIn()
+ haveBorrowedBooks()

}

+ beLoggedIn()

}
class Librarian {

+ issueBook()
+ updateInformationInDatabase()
}
class Guest {
+ searchBooks()
+ viewMembers()
}
